author: mgpinf
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

Option to display / instead of \ everywhere

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Remove read-only property from [System.IO.path]::DirectorySeparatorChar.
[System.IO.path]::AltDirectorySeparatorChar exists as / but I want forward slashes to be displayed by default. As someone working across cross-platform, the looking at "\\" in shell is irritating.

See https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/8587#issuecomment-477375667
